uvi.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix array index out of bound exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.241 by commit 44651522941c623e20882b3b443f23f77de1ea8b. For more details please see the references link.
